page_content:
Save Map to Image

Version:MissionOS_2.0

A map being viewed on the platform can be saved using the Save Map dropdown (Refer the figure below). The user can either save an image of the map for use in a report or save the map as an interactive element used on a canvas sheet.

 

 

Select the Save Map option.

The user is prompted to either right-click to copy (to paste elsewhere) or save the image in an appropriate format.

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on Save Map to Image, simply click on the link or thumbnail below:

videos.title: How To: Save Map to Image
